Headline: Software Engineer
Summary: As a Software Engineer at Sustainability Economics, I apply my data engineering skills to build and maintain reliable data pipelines that support the company's mission of promoting sustainable development and social justice. I use Python, Scrapy, and Beautiful Soup to collect and process data from various sources, and AWS S3, Jira, and Prefect to store, manage, and orchestrate data workflows. I also utilize TensorFlow, Power BI, and Excel to implement machine learning models and create visualizations that inform data-driven decisions and solutions.  I graduated with a Bachelor of Technology degree in Computer Science from RISE Gandhi Group of Institutions in 2021, where I learned the fundamentals of programming, data structures, algorithms, databases, and software engineering. I gained hands-on experience in developing and deploying web applications using REST APIs, CI/CD, and Docker. I also obtained multiple certifications in Python, JavaScript, and data science from reputable platforms such as CutShort, HackerRank, and Udemy. I am passionate about staying updated with industry trends and learning new technologies that can enhance my data engineering capabilities and contribute to the company's goals. I am a detail-oriented problem solver, a highly motivated team player, and a committed learner.
